table.title: Only Knowledge objects on both stacks

search.query: | inputlookup $lookup$_all_field_extraction_src.csv | eval src = "true" | rename eai:acl.app as src_APP, value as src_value | append [| rest splunk_server=local /services/data/props/extractions | fields title eai:acl.app, value, title | rename eai:acl.app as dest_APP, value as dest_value | eval dest="true"] | stats values(*) as * by title | eval src = if(isnull(src), "false", src), dest = if(isnull(dest), "false", dest) | search dest=true src="true" | fields title, *_APP, *_value | eval equal = if(src_value==dest_value,1,0) | search equal=$equal$ | sort src_APP
